price: آن روز، [به علت روشن‌بودن همۀ امور،] از انس و جن [دربارۀ گناهانشان] سؤال نخواهد شد؛
arabic: فَيَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّا يُسۡـَٔلُ عَن ذَنۢبِهِۦٓ إِنسٞ وَلَا جَآنّٞ

version.title: Persian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Persian by the team of the Persian language in Rowwad Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fayawma-idhin lā yus'alu ʿan dhanbihi insun walā jānnun
